p: We included published, peer-reviewed quantitative and qualitative studies describing PEARLES challenges and solutions to clinical research responses to epidemics or pandemics identified during previous outbreak responses or through research involving health system stakeholders. We did not exclude reports based on study adesign. We included editorials and other ‘opinion’ articles when these were based on experiences derived from clinical research responses to emerging epidemics or pandemics. Conference abstracts were included as an important source of data not yet published in full [ 10]. We excluded studies presenting findings only relating to public health responses and not to clinical research. Studies presenting study outcomes without a reflection on challenges and/or solutions were excluded.
